document_data.name: Theras
document_data.mainbody: '''Theras''' was a [[half-elf]] [[druid]] and the bastard child of a prince.
document_data.Description: Clad in brown robes and a green cloak, Theras had lengthy brown hair, partially worked into a braid over his right ear.
document_data.Possessions: Theras owned a magical ''[[hornblade (magic item)|hornblade]]'' scimitar, in addition to an enchanted suit of [[leather armor]] and a mundane [[shield]].
document_data.History: Although he was a forest-dwelling druid, Theras was resented by his legitimate half-brother. When Theras's forest was burned down by his half-brother, he fled, only to return a decade later. Theras exacted revenge by strangling his brother with the foliage of the regrown forest.
